features: Adjustable support for optimal sitting posture
Malleable buckwheat fill shapes to any bottom
Round shape is our most "traditional" cushion shape
18" x 18" x 5" (46 cm x 46cm x13cm) in diameter
Filled with natural Canadian buckwheat hulls
Cushions are filled by volume. Due to the natural differences in buckwheat, weight may vary by + or 5%
100% cotton cover made in Burnaby, BC
Product Care: Unzip case and pour hulls into a bag
Cold wash cover, hang to dry, refill.
